data.name: Eniko: Ghosts Of Grace Demo
data.detailed_description:
Explore Belrynna, the capital city, and the Woodlands of Yarle in this demo version of Eniko: Ghosts Of Grace. Learn about the history of the city and Doirosz, it's Patron Saint, find hidden dungeons and Shrines and complete at least 3 sidequests to be allowed to fight the mighty Behemoth in the Arena, the final boss for this demo.

The great Fenrir Wars lay in the past but in Belrynna, the heroics of the war's Champions is celebrated zealously in the Arena. Livia is a promising young Warrior training at Zigmond Academy. Gusty but ambitious, she will both have to fight the mighty Fenrir in the Arena and deal with the political games outside the Arena. Will Livia be able to climb the ranks and become a champion of the Arena? After a fateful encounter, everything she believes in will be put to the test.

Eniko: Ghosts Of Grace is a story-rich action rpg that pays hommage to jrpg games and 90's gaming through it's unique retro 2.5D pixel art look, but is bold and refreshing enough to carve it's own path. Join Livia on her adventure through a tale that explores what it means to be family, betrayal versus loyalty and the long-term effects of indoctrination and a brutal war on society.


Features:
  • Run, jump and use tools to explore this unique 2.5D world with a retro pixel look
  • A wide linear story rich game with intricate, loveable characters
  • Action Battle system that combines the best of 90’s jrpg games and modern action rpg games
  • Discover vibrant lively cities, cozy hidden villages, vast areas and challenging Crypts
  • Sidequests, hidden Shrines and Arena Challenges to delve deeper in the world of Eniko
  • Intricate License System and blacksmithing system to improve your stats and skills
  • Breathtaking orchestral soundtrack composed by Nickolas Wolfe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum 1280x720 display is recommended but is not required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6100 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum 1280x720 display is recommended but is not required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.12 (Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6100 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
